insert.foreach: INSERT INTO t_loan_user_repay ( invest_id, product_id, user_id, repay_amount, repay_interest, repay_time, repay_real_time, repay_seqno, repay_resp_code) VALUES ( #{repay.investId}, #{repay.productId}, #{repay.userId}, #{repay.amount}, #{repay.interest}, #{repay.repayTime}, #{repay.repayRealTime}, #{repay.repaySeqno}, #{repay.repayResponseCode} )

mapper.select: SELECT ur.* FROM t_loan_user_repay ur INNER JOIN t_loan_user_investment ui ON ur.invest_id = ui.invest_id WHERE repay_time = current_date AND ui.pay_resp_code = '0000' AND ui.transfer_resp_code = '0000'
SELECT * FROM t_loan_user_repay WHERE product_id = #{_productId} ORDER BY repay_time LIMIT #{_pageSize} OFFSET #{_offset}
